trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged" /> or <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar" />.
When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example displays a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control that displays one calendar year.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra un formulario que contenga un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control que muestra un año del calendario.

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting properties like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> to customize the look of the calendar control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo se muestra cómo establecer las propiedades como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TitleForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.CalendarDimensions%2A>, y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.TrailingForeColor%2A> para personalizar la apariencia del control calendar.

trans-unit.source: Other properties like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> are set to customize which dates are bolded.
trans-unit.target: Otras propiedades, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.AnnuallyBoldedDates%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.BoldedDates%2A>, y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MonthlyBoldedDates%2A> se establecen para personalizar las fechas que aparecen en negrita.

trans-unit.source: The example also sets properties to change the calendar format, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo también define propiedades para cambiar el formato del calendario, incluidos los <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxDate%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MinDate%2A>, y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.MaxSelectionCount%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> events are also handled and their status displayed on the form.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> también se controlan los eventos y su estado se muestra en el formulario.
